description:
Top Injury Lawyers In Augusta, Maine

For those living in or near our state's capital who are suffering as the result of someone else's negligent, careless or unlawful actions, the legal professionals at Peter Thompson & Associates in Augusta, Maine, are here to help you secure the maximum amount of compensation and benefits possible.

The Experience You Need For The Results You Deserve

As veterans of more than 100 jury trials and possessing over 60 years of combined legal experience among us, the attorneys at our law firm have achieved a high level of success advocating on behalf of those in need. Our law firm boasts a success rate of more than 98 percent for all types of personal injury and wrongful death claims, and we have recovered millions of dollars in settlements and awards on behalf of those we have served.
As a result of our success, our attorneys have won numerous awards and honors for our professionalism and service, and U.S. News & World Report listed us among the "Best Law Firms" in the state.

Compassionate Counsel, Aggressive Advocacy

While we are proud of the national recognition we have received, even more important to us is the positive feedback we receive from our clients. In surveys completed by our clients, we were rated 4.9 out of 5 stars for “responsiveness” and “overall satisfaction,” with 100 percent of our clients stating they “would recommend” our firm to others. At Peter Thompson & Associates, every client matters to us.

To receive a free initial consultation concerning your claim, you can contact Peter Thompson & Associates by calling our law office or filling out the form located on our website.
